titles.title: For the relief of certain Persian Gulf evacuees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 106-580.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 11.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 659.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee substitute as amended agreed to by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Smith (TX) asked unanimous consent that the House agree to the Senate amendment.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to without objection.

reference.label: text as House agreed to Senate amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/10/2000--Introduced. Directs the Attorney General to adjust the status of each of specified Persian Gulf evacuees to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence for purposes of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
